ComicInfo.Title: Terror in The Swamp!; Clickity-Split!; Sorcerer's Death Wish!
ComicInfo.Writer: Ed DeGeorge,Edward DeGeorge,Matt Roach,Ryan Brown,Shawn Van Briesen,Ed Quinby,Edward DeGeorge,Matt Roach,Ryan Brown,Shawn Van Briesen,Ed Quinby
ComicInfo.Summary: Dr. Weird stops Lemuel Brisbane from sacrificing an innocent baby in an obscene ritual. Pursuing him into the swamp, he encounters The Bog, who believes Weird is trespassing on his domain. After realizing his mistake in challenging Weird, The Bog tricks him into believing him dead.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Matt Roach,David Vance,Shawn Van Briesen,Ed Quinby,Matt Roach,David Vance,Shawn Van Briesen,Ed Quinby
ComicInfo.Inker: Matt Roach,David Vance,Ed Quinby,Matt Roach,David Vance,Ed Quinby
ComicInfo.Letterer: David Vance,Justin A. Mac,David Vance,Justin A. Mac
